data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the Prayer bell.
This is a semi-outdoors location with low stone walls, a great view of the surrounding town, creaky worn out floor, and a very large brass bell.  There is a long rope hanging down the center that one can grab and proceed to ring the bell to call people to service.
There's an inkwell, a writing quill, and a bell here.

You are carrying a bible and a cross, and wearing some muddy shoes and a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I will prepare my sermon for the big prayer service this evening.
data.mid_motivation: I will give my sermon and conduct the evening prayer service in the Prayer bell.
data.long_motivation: I will carry out my duties to God and the people of the town, so that they may find salvation in these troubled times.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get writing quill from Prayer bell
